trans-unit.source: Represents a composition during the text input events of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox" />.
trans-unit.target: Representa una composición durante los eventos de entrada de texto de un objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionEventArgs.TextComposition%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property is a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition> when the user enters text into a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> by using an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ime](~/includes/tlasharptla-ime-md.md)] and the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate>, or <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionEventArgs.TextComposition%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propiedad es una <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition> cuando el usuario escribe texto en un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> mediante el uso de un [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ime](~/includes/tlasharptla-ime-md.md)] y <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate>, o <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart> se produce el evento.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition> is the base class of <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkRichTextComposition>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition> es la clase base de <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkRichTextComposition>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkRichTextComposition> class defines properties that return <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer> objects to indicate the position of the text composition.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkRichTextComposition> clase define propiedades que devuelven <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextPointer> objetos para indicar la posición de la composición de texto.

trans-unit.source: When the user enters text into a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RichTextBox>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionEventArgs.TextComposition%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> is a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkRichTextComposition>.
trans-unit.target: Cuando el usuario escribe texto en un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RichTextBox>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionEventArgs.TextComposition%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> es una <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkRichTextComposition>.

trans-unit.source: Finalizes the composition.
trans-unit.target: Finaliza la composición.

trans-unit.source: Gets the length of the current composition in Unicode symbols.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene la longitud de la composición actual en símbolos Unicode.

trans-unit.source: The length of the current composition in Unicode symbols.
trans-unit.target: Longitud de la composición actual en símbolos Unicode.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.CompositionLength%2A> property indicates how many characters have been entered since the last <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput> event.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.CompositionLength%2A> propiedad indica cuántos caracteres se han escrito desde el último <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput> eventos.

trans-unit.source: This property is only meaningful when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart> or <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Esta propiedad solo es significativa cuando el <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart> o <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate> se produce el evento.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput> event occurs, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.CompositionLength%2A> is –1, and the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.ResultLength%2A> property indicates the length of the composition.
trans-unit.target: Cuando el <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput> se produce el evento <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.CompositionLength%2A> es – 1 y el <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.ResultLength%2A> propiedad indica la longitud de la composición.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.CompositionLength%2A> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.CompositionLength%2A> se introdujo en la versión 3.5 de .NET Framework.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
trans-unit.target: Para más información, vea [Versiones y dependencias](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

trans-unit.source: Gets the position at which the composition text occurs in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene la posición en la que aparece la composición de texto en el objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox" />.

trans-unit.source: The position at which the composition text occurs in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox" />.
trans-unit.target: Posición en la que aparece la composición de texto en el objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox" />.

trans-unit.source: This property is only meaningful when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart> or <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Esta propiedad solo es significativa cuando el <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart> o <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate> se produce el evento.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput> event occurs, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.CompositionLength%2A> is –1, and the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.ResultOffset%2A> property indicates the position of the composition text.
trans-unit.target: Cuando el <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput> se produce el evento <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.CompositionLength%2A> es – 1 y el <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.ResultOffset%2A> propiedad indica la posición de la composición de texto.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.CompositionOffset%2A> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.CompositionOffset%2A> se introdujo en la versión 3.5 de .NET Framework.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
trans-unit.target: Para más información, vea [Versiones y dependencias](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

trans-unit.source: Gets the length of the finalized text in Unicode symbols when the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput" /> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene la longitud del texto finalizado en símbolos Unicode cuando se provoca el evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput" />.

trans-unit.source: The length of the finalized text in Unicode symbols when the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput" /> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Longitud del texto finalizado en símbolos Unicode cuando se provoca el evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput" />.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart> or <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate> event occurs, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.ResultLength%2A> is –1.
trans-unit.target: Cuando el <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart> o <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate> se produce el evento <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.ResultLength%2A> es – 1.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.ResultLength%2A> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.ResultLength%2A> se introdujo en la versión 3.5 de .NET Framework.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
trans-unit.target: Para más información, vea [Versiones y dependencias](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

trans-unit.source: Gets the offset of the finalized text when the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput" /> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene el desplazamiento del texto finalizado en símbolos Unicode cuando se provoca el evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput" />.

trans-unit.source: The offset of the finalized text when the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput" /> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Desplazamiento del texto finalizado en símbolos Unicode cuando se provoca el evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput" />.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart> or <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate> event occurs, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.ResultLength%2A> is –1.
trans-unit.target: Cuando el <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart> o <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate> se produce el evento <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.ResultLength%2A> es – 1.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.ResultOffset%2A> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FrameworkTextComposition.ResultOffset%2A> se introdujo en la versión 3.5 de .NET Framework.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
trans-unit.target: Para más información, vea [Versiones y dependencias](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
